We see these often when running the test suite. The issue appears to be the 
fact that the UI is updating asynchronously with the model. Thus, a debug event 
is fired, and queued to be handled by the UI. Meanwhile, the target program 
moves on (and possibly terminates). When the UI gets a chance to upate, it then 
tries to communicate with a termianted target, resulting in the exception.

Unclear on the best way to handle these problems.
